form.heading: Form Example
form.generalInfo: The following form is only a demonstration of how to create an accessible form. It only validates the input (on client side) in order to show error messages. The data you enter will not be sent to a server, stored or processed anywhere.
form.requiredFieldsInfo: Required fields are marked with an asterisk (*) and must be filled in to complete the form.

email.label: E-Mail
email.error: Please enter your e-mail address in the format "username@server.domain". Example: alex@gmail.com

testingTools.legend: Which Accessibilty Testing Tools Do You Know?

success.message: Congratulations {{name}}! You've successfully submitted the form.
success.testingTools: You know the following testing tools
